## BlockSvg.tab() method

Open the next (or previous) FieldTextInput.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
tab(start: Field, forward: boolean): void;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  start | [Field](./blockly.field_class.md) | Current field. |
|  forward | boolean | If true go forward, otherwise backward. |

void
